newsitem.title: CHINA: PRESS DIGEST - Chinese newspapers - Dec 3.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Chinese newspapers - Dec 3.

text.p: Following is a summary of major Chinese political and business stories in leading newspapers, prepared by Reuters in Beijing. Reuters has not checked the stories and does not guarantee their accuracy. Telephone: (8610) 6532-1921. Fax: (8610) 6532-4978.
Politburo member Li Ruihuan urges Tianjin to emphasise politics
Shanghai Mayor Xu Kuangdi outlines goals for economy
Commentary says return of Hong Kong is factor in South Africa's decision to switch recognition from Taiwan to Beijing
President Jiang Zemin supports nuclear free zone in speech in Pakistan
Defence Minister Chi Haotian leaves for United States
Zhou Daojiong, chairman of China Securities Regulatory Commission, says standardisation is main task for listing companies
China 1997 economic blue print suggests development of capital markets
Central bank vice governor Yan Jieyan hopes to cement cooperation with Federal Reserve
